card.text: Affinity for artifacts Artifacts you control have power and toughness equal to the number of artifacts you control and are creatures in addition to their other types.

Elementals you control have ‚Äú{T}: Add one mana of any color‚Äù and are lands in addition to their other types. Lands you control produce one extra mana of any type that land could produce.

card.name: Taranis, the Avenger
card.text: Hexproof If a creature dying or entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Tsuyo and Shina
card.text: Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 4-6 5/5 Remove a level counter from Tsuyo and Shina: They gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. LEVEL 7+ 6/6 Remove four level counters from Tsuyo and Shina: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Iwato
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever Iwato attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, you may swap Iwato's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Ellysia Elite Captain
card.text: [+1]: Create a 2/2 green Elf Warrior creature token with ìWhen this creature deals damage, put a loyalty counter on an Ellysia planeswalker you control.î [0]: Until end of turn, Ellysia, Elite Captain becomes an indestructible Elf Warrior creature with power and toughness equal to the number of loyalty counters on her. Sheís still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her this turn. [-7]: You get an emblem with ìWhenever a creature you control attacks, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to any target.î Ellysia, Elite Captain can be your commander.
